itemInfo.itemDesc: A necklace decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Rough Topaz
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Topaz Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Platinum Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Platinum Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Platinum.

item.name: Resplendent Topaz Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Resplendent Topaz.
